# limps Planning Documents
> Planning documents for limps

## Quick Start
- [Plans Directory](/plans/): All plans and supporting docs

## Plan Structure
Each plan contains:
- `{plan-name}-plan.md` - Full specifications and requirements
- `interfaces.md` - API contracts and type definitions (if present)
- `gotchas.md` - Known issues and edge cases (if present)
- `agents/` - Task breakdown with status tracking

## Status Legend
- GAP: Not started
- WIP: In progress
- PASS: Complete
- BLOCKED: Waiting on dependencies
